creator: robert.flaherty@oracle.com
text: CopyFile and CopyDir are documented, and listed as deprecated.  This should probably be the same.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text:
that class should have never been released.

the task was written before ResourceCollection support was added to <copy> but after Ant 1.6.5, so it was obsolete with the very first release it appeared in (1.7.0).

This is different from copydir and copyfile that existed since Ant 1.1 and were obsoleted in 1.2.

I've added a bunch of deprecation warnings, but don't see any real reason to add a documentation page for it - we don't want people to use the task at all.
